results.name: 1 iff n is of the form 4^m*(8k+7).
comment: Characteristic function of A004215, indicating numbers not the sum of 3 integer squares.
link: J.-P. Allouche and J. Shallit, The ring of k-regular sequences, Theoretical Computer Sci., 98 (1992), 163-197; preprint. See Example 20.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Numbers.
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares.
